action.title: 安装APatch
action.set:
echo 正在下载（需要VPN访问Github服务器） curl -fLOJ https://github.com/Twmcy/Twmcy.github.io/releases/download/update/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk -o /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk
cp $PREFIX/Data_Dir/.Empty/*.apk /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin
cp $img /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/ APatch.sh cp /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/boot-apatch.img /sdcard/RootES

action.title: 保留APatch
action.set:
echo 正在下载（需要VPN访问Github服务器） curl -fLOJ https://github.com/Twmcy/Twmcy.github.io/releases/download/update/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk -o /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/APatch_10442-4-g86e7698.apk
cp $PREFIX/Data_Dir/.Empty/*.apk /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin
APatch-Root.sh cp /data/user/$ANDROID_UID/$Package_name/files/usr/xbin/boot-apatch.img /sdcard/RootES
